main.name: REHEMA MWAKA
main.description: I am Student @ MMUST Kenya. I love coding , and I aspire to become a great developer. I currently code every day. I am a Full Stack Javascript developer
main.bio: I can work on both the front-end and the back-end of any application. I am also experienced with building scalable projects, and managing large code bases. Currently, I am a student at Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology. On my spare time I work on various different projects to build my skills and continue learning..

education.school: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.description: I have acquired major skills in school that is programming in Java, C, C++, Javascript. In my third year i developed a system that automaticaly generates the university timetable using Genetic Algorithms as my project. This system was in Java and ReactJs .

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Build scalable Applications using ReactJs, Typescript, Nodejs

work.title: Software developer
work.description: I work as a software developer, developing applications using ReactJs, Php and Nodejs
